definition: to flow at great speed/to pour/racing current
to hurry/to rush/to run quickly/to elope
to flow/to disseminate/to circulate or spread/to move or drift/to degenerate/to banish or send into exile/stream of water or sth resembling one/class, rate or grade

sentences.english: Is flowing rapidly rest Dujiang weirs not to have our happy song joke.
sentences.chinese: 在奔流不息的都江堰有我們的歡歌笑語。

sentences.english: Is it not stange that most of us choose sucking rather than running?
sentences.chinese: 但我們大多寧肯吮吸卻不願奔流向前，這不奇怪嗎？

sentences.english: The River Han flows through Wuhan.
To melt and be like a running book that sings its melody to the night.
sentences.chinese: 融化爲一道奔流的溪水，在夜晚吟唱自己的清曲。
生命的流逝像奔流的江河。

sentences.english: The river roars like a dragon.
sentences.chinese: 河水奔流的聲音猶如龍吟虎嘯。

sentences.english: To melt and be like a running brook that sings its melody to the night .
sentences.chinese: 融合爲一道奔流的溪水，在夜晚吟唱自己的清曲。

sentences.english: The river water can rush unrestrainedly.
sentences.chinese: 河水可以無拘束地奔流了。

sentences.english: The Yangtze River flows on forever without stopping.
sentences.chinese: 萬里長江終古不息地奔流着。

sentences.english: Lava heads for the sea as Mount Etna erupts Wednesday night on Sicily.
sentences.chinese: 西西里島上的埃特納火山星期三爆發，岩漿奔流入海。

sentences.english: The fast-flowing Nu offers vast potential for hydropower.
sentences.chinese: 快速奔流的怒江有巨大的水電潛力。

sentences.english: All that remains is the boundless Yangtze River, flowing on towards heaven.
sentences.chinese: 眼前只剩茫茫的長江水，奔流天邊。

sentences.english: A small stream ran down among the rocks.
sentences.chinese: 一條小溪在岩石間奔流而下。

sentences.english: Any unseeded torrents will be deleted on sight regardless of the reason.
sentences.chinese: 任何的被不播種的奔流將會不管理由在視力上劃除。

sentences.english: It flushed after the heavy rain.

definition: (of waves) to surge forward/to roll on in waves/to gallop
to surge up violently (of ocean, river, lake etc)/turbulent
(of a watercourse) to breach its dike/(of dikes) to collapse
to gush/to squirt/to surge/to well out/to overflow
